thread.section_title: Zankyou opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Zankyou | www.zankyou.com
thread.title: Ale Estrada

author: Ale Estrada
title: Ale Estrada
text:
I liked this site to have our wedding registry, my husband and I wanted to received money for gifts because we are living somewhere else and we don't have the space to put all the gifts we would have received. The idea is that when we get a place we can actually by those gifts with the money we got.
Zankyou helped us with that although I received complains from some of my guests that couldn't make the deposit, I guess not all credit cards are available, a lot of those where visas and still nothing... and they don't accept American Express either... But other than that, it was a great service.
